name: URBAN TRIAL FREESTYLE 2
description:
Prepare yourself for numerous new levels in five stunning locations. Pull off insane stunts on top of skyscrapers, speed down busy highways and take an intense ride through the suburbs while competing with others to get to the top of the leaderboards!

Raise the bar by making the highest jumps or the most head-spinning flips in Stunt Mode! Try Time Attack and beat the best time at neck-breaking speeds! Take on the Challenge levels to test your skills!

Create your own unique levels in the Track Editor and share them with friends!

Still not enough thrills? Then try downloading more player-made tracks for endless replayability!
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
